2012

Dahlia Barn

Role: Design

Farm direct flowers needed to look as good as it sounded. The task was to revamp their e-commerce site, adding new features and updating the design. The main objective was to modernize their appearance. Vivid floral colors helped to liven things up, bringing spring into the user's home.

The Color Spectrum

Color is in no shortage when it comes to flowers. I wanted to carry the bright, vivid colors of flowers into the website. In combination with a clean white background, the colors pop and compliment the product well.

#FF8213
#ACCC10
#DE2D67
#FFFE4A

Design

How can we bring the farm to the user? First was to brighten the website. Pastel colors had to be replaced with the bolder variety. Sweeping images of the farms brings the farm experience into your home.

From shipping schedules, news, calendars, and plant care info, there is an ample amount of informative content throughout the website. Finding distinct places and finding the correct hierarchy for this information was of importance. Providing the user exactly what they need to know before they start shopping was key.
